metaTitle: ZENIA VICTORY Orihuela Costa | 3-Bed Villas From €495,000
metaDescription: ZENIA VICTORY by NAYA: Modern 3-bedroom villas in La Zenia, Orihuela Costa. From €495,000. Delivery April 2026. Near Blue Flag beaches & golf.

content.heroIntro: ZENIA VICTORY represents the pinnacle of contemporary villa living in La Zenia, Orihuela Costa. Developed by NAYA, a trusted name in Costa Blanca construction, this exclusive project delivers 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas with 176m² of meticulously designed living space on 143m² plots. Available from €495,000, ZENIA VICTORY offers exceptional value—35% less than comparable properties on Costa Blanca North—while maintaining luxury finishes and smart architectural design. Scheduled for completion on 01-04-2026, these villas are perfect for families, investors, and expats seeking the perfect blend of Mediterranean lifestyle and modern comfort. With Villamartín golf course on your doorstep and La Zenia's Blue Flag beach just moments away, ZENIA VICTORY connects you to Orihuela Costa's thriving international community of British, Scandinavian, and Dutch residents.

locationSection.intro: La Zenia is the heart of Orihuela Costa's most desirable residential zone. This vibrant area combines authentic Spanish charm with world-class amenities, making it ideal for those seeking an authentic Costa Blanca lifestyle. La Zenia has evolved into a cosmopolitan hub with excellent healthcare facilities, quality education options, and outstanding recreational opportunities. The area is renowned for its safety, strong expat communities, and English-speaking services. Whether you're seeking a permanent home, holiday retreat, or investment property, La Zenia offers the perfect balance of accessibility and lifestyle. The area benefits from exceptional proximity to Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, and the major La Zenia Boulevard shopping center.
highlights: Beach: La Zenia (Blue Flag) - 5 minutes; Campoamor - 10 minutes
Golf: Villamartín Championship Course - on doorstep
Hospital: Hospital de Torrevieja - 15 minutes; Quirónsalud - 20 minutes
Shopping: La Zenia Boulevard, Mercadona, Consum, Lidl within 10 minutes
Restaurants: Diverse dining from tapas bars to fine dining within walking distance

propertyFeatures.intro: ZENIA VICTORY villas exemplify modern Spanish construction excellence. Built to the highest standards by NAYA, each property features premium materials, energy-efficient systems, and contemporary finishes throughout. The villas showcase open-plan living areas with high ceilings, creating spacious and luminous interiors that seamlessly connect indoor and outdoor spaces. Every detail has been carefully considered, from structural integrity to aesthetic appeal, ensuring these homes deliver both comfort and style for decades to come.
features: Private swimming pool with modern filtration
Fitted kitchen with stainless steel appliances
Double glazing with thermal break technology
Private parking space with paved driveway
Modern bathroom fixtures with thermostatic controls
Video entry system with smartphone integration

content.investmentSection: Orihuela Costa represents one of Spain's most dynamic real estate markets. Property values show consistent growth of +10% year-on-year, driven by increasing demand from international buyers and strong rental demand. ZENIA VICTORY's pricing at 35% below Costa Blanca North comparables offers exceptional value appreciation potential. The rental market is robust, with 7-night holiday lets commanding €800+ per week, providing excellent passive income for investors. The area's growing infrastructure, enhanced healthcare facilities, and expanding expat communities create sustained demand. NAYA's reputation for quality construction and timely delivery adds confidence to your investment. With delivery scheduled for April 2026, you're investing in a property that will benefit from continued market appreciation and immediate income-generating potential.
whyBuySection: Prime location in La Zenia's most sought-after residential zone
Trusted developer NAYA with proven track record in Orihuela Costa
Exceptional value—35% less than comparable Costa Blanca North properties
3 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms with premium finishes
Strong international community: British, Scandinavian, Dutch residents with English widely spoken
Direct access to La Zenia (Blue Flag) and Campoamor beaches
Villamartín Championship Golf Course on your doorstep
Hospital de Torrevieja just 15 minutes away with English-speaking staff
Excellent rental income potential (€800+ per week)

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in ZENIA VICTORY?
faqs.answer: From €495,000. ZENIA VICTORY offers 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas with 176m² of built space on 143m² plots. This represents exceptional value in Orihuela Costa. Contact us today for current availability and detailed pricing information.

faqs.question: When will ZENIA VICTORY be completed?
faqs.answer: 01-04-2026. NAYA provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty with all properties. We can provide specific unit delivery timelines upon request—contact us via WhatsApp for personalized information.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of ZENIA VICTORY?
faqs.answer: NAYA, an established developer with an excellent reputation for quality construction and timely project delivery in Orihuela Costa and the broader Costa Blanca region. NAYA is known for attention to detail and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Orihuela Costa a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Orihuela Costa offers strong investment fundamentals with +10% year-on-year property appreciation. The area features excellent amenities including Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes), Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, and La Zenia Boulevard shopping center. The strong British, Scandinavian, and Dutch communities ensure English is widely spoken. It's ideal for families, retirees, and investors.

faqs.question: How far is ZENIA VICTORY from the beach?
faqs.answer: Just 5 minutes to La Zenia (Blue Flag), one of Costa Blanca's most beautiful beaches. Campoamor and Cabo Roig are 10-15 minutes away. You'll enjoy Mediterranean beach living with immediate coastal access.

faqs.question: What amenities are near ZENIA VICTORY?
faqs.answer: Excellent nearby amenities include: Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes), Villamartín Golf Course (on doorstep), La Zenia Boulevard shopping center, Mercadona and Consum supermarkets, multiple restaurants and bars, El Limonar School (15 minutes), and several medical centers with English-speaking staff.

faqs.question: Is Orihuela Costa safe?
faqs.answer: Yes. Orihuela Costa is recognized as a safe, well-established residential area with strong community standards. The area benefits from good local police presence, established expat communities, and family-oriented neighborhoods. Hospital de Torrevieja provides excellent emergency services within 15 minutes.

faqs.question: How far is Orihuela Costa from Alicante?
faqs.answer: Approximately 50 kilometers south of Alicante city, Orihuela Costa is just 30 minutes from Alicante International Airport (ALC). This proximity provides excellent access for international travel while maintaining a peaceful, coastal lifestyle away from urban congestion.

content.conclusion: ZENIA VICTORY by NAYA represents a remarkable opportunity to invest in premium Mediterranean living at an exceptional price point. With delivery scheduled for April 2026, you're securing a modern, beautifully designed villa in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. The combination of strong property appreciation (+10% year-on-year), excellent rental income potential (€800+ weekly), proximity to Blue Flag beaches, championship golf, and world-class amenities makes ZENIA VICTORY an intelligent choice for families, investors, and discerning buyers. Don't miss this opportunity to join Orihuela Costa's thriving international community. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed specifications, floor plans, and current availability. Your dream Costa Blanca villa awaits.
